description: The Paonia is your everyday essential, now in a weather-ready Chelsea silhouette. The Paonia collection is the closest fit you will get to a Z/Sandal made in a closed-toe year round style. An upper built from waterproof, waxy suede leather keeps the elements out, while our Gold-Rated sourcing keeps the environmental standard that defines our commitment to sustainability. The Paonia Chelsea is ready to be worn every day of the week.
name: Chaco Paonia Chelsea WTPF - Mens
